TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusStrip extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip

summary.span: 表示 Windows 状态栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows status bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替换控件。 replaces the control. 特殊功能包括自定义表布局，支持的窗体的大小调整和移动手柄，并支持属性，它允许以自动填充可用空间。Special features of include a custom table layout, support for the form's sizing and moving grips, and support for the property, which allows a to fill available space automatically. 以下各项专门用于两个无缝和在所有方向。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 这些信息可默认情况下在设计时控件：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - - 控件将显示有关在 上查看的对象、对象组件的信息或应用程序内与该对象操作相关的上下文信息。A control displays information about an object being viewed on a , the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application. 通常， 控件由 对象组成，每个对象将显示文本、图标或两者都有。Typically, a control consists of objects, each of which displays text, an icon, or both. 也可以包括 、 和 控件。The can also contain , , and controls. 默认 没有面板。The default has no panels. 若要将面板添加到，使用方法或使用[StatusStrip 项集合编辑器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1)在设计时添加、 删除或重新排序项和修改属性。To add panels to a , use the method, or use the [StatusStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1) at design time to add, remove, or reorder items and modify properties. 使用[StatusStrip 任务对话框](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c)在设计时运行常用命令。Use the [StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c) at design time to run common commands. 尽管 替换并扩展了早期版本的 控件，但也可以选择保留 以备向后兼容性和将来使用。Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了的各种常见属性设置。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

member this.Dock : System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要停靠在其父控件上的 边框，并确定 如何随其父控件一起调整大小。

span.span: Gets or sets which borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a is resized with its parent.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义如何调整其父控件的大小时自动调整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，设置到导致将其自身与其父控件的左边缘对齐，并根据调整父控件的大小调整的大小。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控件停靠在其 Z 顺序，即沿窗体的 z 轴 （深度） 窗体上控件的可视化分层。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边缘或可停靠到所有边缘并填充父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的各种常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用作重新定位控件的手柄的可见性。

span.span: Gets or sets the visibility of the grip used to reposition the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使属性设置为`true`和属性设置为`Visible`，将不显示大小调整手柄，除非还设置溢出值之一的属性。Even with the property set to `true` and the property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the property to one of the overflow values. 如果属性设置为或，将不会显示大小调整手柄。If the property is set to or , the sizing grip will not be displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的各种常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来显示要提供给用户时指示手柄是可调整大小。You can use the property to display a grip to provide an indication to the user of when a is resizable. 即使属性设置为`true`和属性设置为`Visible`，将不显示大小调整手柄，除非还设置溢出值之一的属性。Even with the property set to `true` and the property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the property to one of the overflow values. 如果属性设置为或，将不会显示大小调整手柄。If the property is set to or , the sizing grip will not be displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的各种常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构包装 Windows 将发送的消息。The structure wraps messages that Windows sends. 此结构可用于包装消息，并将其分配给窗口过程以进行调度。You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched. 此结构还可用于获取有关消息系统发送给你的应用程序或控件的信息。You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls. 无法创建直接结构。You cannot create the structure directly. 若要创建结构，请使用方法。To create a structure, use the method. 以方便创建结构更高效结构使用其现有的池结构而不是如有可能创建一个新实例。To make creating structures more efficient, the structure uses its pool of existing structures instead of creating an instance of a new one, if possible. 但是，如果结构在池中不可用，请创建该结构的新实例。However, if a structure is not available in the pool, a new instance of the structure is created.
